title: Backports for 1.12.1
body:
Backported PRs:
- [x] #59631 <!-- Set world bounds on `CodeInfo` created for `OpaqueClosure(::IRCode)` -->
- [x] #59628 <!-- Fix gcdx and lcm with mixed signed/unsigned arguments -->
- [x] #59706 
- [x] #59063
- [x] #59672
- [x] #59722 
- [x] #59720 
- [x] #59680 <!-- fix `powermod` correctness on unsigned power of half typemax -->
- [x] #59719 <!-- retain size for zero length multidimensional arrays in mmap -->
- [x] #59709 <!-- improve compile-ability of method errors -->
- [x] #59728 <!-- iobuffer: fix overflow OOB read/write bugs -->
- [x] #59725 <!-- fix getting field docstrings for parametric structs -->
- [x] #49637 <!-- Improve floating-point Euclidean division for Float16 and Float32 -->
- [x] #59668 <!-- fix overflow in `prevfloat` with unsigned stepcount -->
- [x] #59745 <!-- [NFC] add tests for typemin power of float -->
- [x] #59730 <!-- [REPL] Do not corrupt input when using numbered_prompt! mode -->
- [x] #59717 <!-- array: avoid overallocation when inserting at beginning of empty arrays -->
- [x] #59736 <!-- Revert "Restrict COFF to a single thread when symbol count is high (#50874)" -->
- [x] #59772 <!-- Avoid method instance normalization for opaque closure methods -->
- [x] #59762 <!-- Allow globalref on lhs of op= -->
- [x] #59782 <!-- fix prefix IntrusiveLinkedList with Base in a REPL test util -->

Need manual backport:
- [ ] #59028 <!-- build: More msys2 fixes -->
- [x] #59123 <!-- [REPL] Fix keyword arguments completions with do block -->
- [x] #59598 <!-- specialize show of `:` to make `reshape` trimmable -->
- [x] #59652 <!-- remove log spamming from precompilepkg code -->
- [x] #59703 <!-- lowering: increment world age after toplevel expressions -->
- [x] #59711 <!-- fix performance of ProductIterator for non-concrete iterators -->
- [x] #59670 <!-- precompile: fix a myriad of concurrency and cache handling mistakes -->
- [x] #59748 <!-- [libblastrampoline] Bump to v5.15.0 -->
- [x] #59726 <!-- [InteractiveUtils] specify code_warntype vararg length -->
- [x] #59766 <!-- Align interpreter and codegen error behavior of setglobal! and friends -->

Contains multiple commits, manual intervention needed:
- [x] #57758 <!-- improve sysimage.mk more completely -->
- [ ] #57143 <!-- Add JuliaLang/JuliaSyntax.jl#525 to NEWS.md, flisp parser, and REPL -->
- [x] #59467 <!-- `CoreLogging`: prevent some `Annotated*`-related instability -->
- [x] #59389 <!-- Print task backtraces on sigquit -->
- [x] #59635 <!-- Change delayed delete mechanism to prevent cross-drive mv failure for in-use DLL -->
- [ ] #58848 <!-- Set array size only when safe to do so -->

Non-merged PRs with backport label:
- [x] #59802 <!-- Add note about `@threads` threadpool -->
- [x] #59793 <!-- [1.12] Backport (improve sysimage.mk more completely (#57758)) -->
- [ ] #59735 <!-- Extend backdating checks to imports and globals -->
- [ ] #59692 <!-- Remove restrictions on kwarg tab completion -->
- [ ] #59450 <!-- Propagate Addrspaces: fix lift of memset -->
- [ ] #58359 <!-- Use dwarf for symbol lookup if dladdr fails before doing linear search. -->
- [ ] #57490 <!-- export `maxthreadid` from `Threads` -->
- [ ] #57422 <!-- Fix performance regression in hvcat of simple matrices -->
- [ ] #55601 <!-- inference: track reaching defs for slots -->
- [ ] #54002 <!-- Switch supertype of CodeUnits from DenseVector to AbstractVector -->
